com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Interface FeatureGraphicsLayer

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, ElementContainer, GraphicsLayer, Layer, Searchable, Selectable, SelectableLayer
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFeatureGraphicsLayer
public interface FeatureGraphicsLayer
extends GraphicsLayer

Manages a collection of Elements that originate from one or more SelectableLayers. It is possible to easily add a set of Elements from a SelectionSet that was obtained from a SelectableLayer, as well as discover the Elements that originated from a given SelectableLayer.

The BaseFeatureGraphicsLayer helper class is used as the SelectionLayer of the Map.

See Also:
SelectableLayer

Method Detail

addFeatures

public SelectionSet addFeatures(SelectableLayer layer,
                                SelectionSet sset,
                                Renderer render,
                                Renderer select)
Adds all Features from a SelectionSet as BaseFeatureElements.

Parameters:
layer - the SelectableLayer
sset - the SelectionSet
render - drawing renderer
select - selection renderer
Returns:
a SelectionSet identifying the elements just added
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null, or the selection refers to non-Feature data, or the selection's target does not originate from the Layer
See Also:
ElementContainer.addElement(Element)

findElements

public SelectionSet findElements(SelectableLayer layer)
Finds all Elements that originated from the given SelectableLayer.

Parameters:
layer - the SelectableLayer
Returns:
the selection set
